nodes.text: The Museum of Abstract Ingenuity was a museum. Theives stole artwork from the museum, and sometime during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, an individual sent an associate to escort the artwork to an art collector on Antar 4.

The Museum of Abstract Ingenuity was first mentioned in the Underworld Trading Crew Skill Mission "Stolen Masterpieces", in BioWare and LucasArts' 2011 massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
